content: crochet hook or knitting needle case materials  25-70 metres 28-77 yards of worsted weight yarn any fibre is fine as long as it s sturdy  5 mm crochet hook  tapestry needle  stitch markers optional  a button  sewing needle and thread to sew the button crochet stitches us terms  chain = chain  slip_stitch = slip_stitch  single_crochet = single_crochet  double_crochet = double_crochet  bob = bobble stitch bobble stitch tutorial yarn over and insert your hook into the next stitch as if to make a double_crochet yarn over and pull up a loop do not pull up the second loop as you would in a double_crochet you now have two loops on your hook first picture repeat this 4 more times 5 times total you now have 6 loops on your hook second picture yarn over and pull the yarn through all 6 loops your bobble is complete happy crocheting  crochet hook case chain 57 row 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook single_crochet until the end of the chain chain 1
